#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>

using namespace std;

double find_p(double x)
{
    double temp;
    x--;
    if(x<2) return -1;
    temp = (x + sqrt(x*x-4))/2;
    return 1/(temp+1);
}

int main()
{
    double p,x;long int t;
    scanf("%ld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lf",&x);
        p=find_p(x);
        if(p==-1) printf("-1\n");
        else
        printf("%0.8lf\n",p);
    }
    return 0;
}
